resources.string:
LEADING AGILE TRANSFORMATIONS AND DELIVERING SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS

A certified Lean Agile Coach with more than 15 years of experience, including software engineering and project management. Manages customer relationships in a consulting capacity throughout the full software development life cycle (SDLC). Experienced in leading international/offshore and domestic resources while delivering projects under budget and on-time.

EXPERIENCE
  • BANK OF AMERICA TECHNOLOGY MANAGER / LEAN AGILE COACH September 2016 - Present
  • ACCENTURE CONSULTANT / TECH MANAGER June 2007 - September 2016
  • WALMART STORES INC. J2EE SOFTWARE ENGINEER August 2003 - June 2007

EDUCATION
  • UNIVERSITY OF TEXAS ARLINGTON, ARLINGTON,TX
    • Certificate Program, PROJECT MANAGEMENT
    • Completed Nov. 2014
  • NORTHWESTERN STATE UNIVERSITY, NATCHITOCHES, LA
    • B.S. COMPUTER SCIENCE, INFORMATION SYSTEMS
    • Graduated Dec. 2003

CERTIFICATIONS
  • PSM 1 - PROFESSIONAL SCRUM MASTER
  • ICP-ATF - AGILE TEAM FACILITATION
  • ICP-ACC - AGILE COACHING
